id< HCMatcher > HC_wrapInMatcher (id item)

Function Documentation

id<HCMatcher> HC_wrapInMatcher ( id  item  ) 

Returns item wrapped (if necessary) in an HCIsEqual matcher.

item is returned as-is if it is already an HCMatcher.
